description:
For owners of MLB® The Show™ 22 Standard Edition only. MLB® The Show™ 22 game NOT INCLUDED with this Add-On product.
 
 Your purchase of Deluxe Add-On grants you: 1 Diamond Choice Pack, Cover Athlete Diamond Choice Pack, 5 Gold Choice Packs, 20 The Show Packs, 1 Ballplayer Pack, an Anime Bat Skin, Double Daily Rewards and 25k Stubs for use in MLB® The Show™ 22. Once acquired, items should be redeemed upon booting the game.
 
 Information on items redeemed should be listed in your Profile mail inbox.
 
 MLB® The Show™ 22 game (sold separately) is required to use this content.
name: MLB® The Show™ 22 Deluxe Add-On
